space.arim.api.sql

Interface SQLExecution

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSql, LoggingSql, PooledLoggingSql, SimpleLoggingSql

    public interface SQLExecution
    A kind of plugin or application which is able to execute queries.

    All methods throw SQLException
    Author:
    A248

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void executionQueries(Collection<ExecutableQuery> queries)
      Same as executionQueries(ExecutableQuery...) but accepts a Collection instead.
      void executionQueries(ExecutableQuery... queries)
      Executes a given set of queries.
      void executionQuery(String query, Object... parameters)
      Executes a single query.
      ResultSet[] selectionQueries(ExecutableQuery... queries)
      Executes a given set of queries and returns the results.
      default ResultSet[] selectionQueries(List<ExecutableQuery> queries)
      Same as selectionQueries(ExecutableQuery...) but accepts a List instead.
      ResultSet selectionQuery(String query, Object... parameters)
      Executes a single query and returns the result.

    • Method Detail

      • executionQueries

        void executionQueries(ExecutableQuery... queries)
               throws SQLException
        Executes a given set of queries. This is a blocking operation.
        Parameters:
        queries - the ExecutableQuery objects to run
        Throws:
        SQLException - if something went wrong

      • executionQueries

        default void executionQueries(Collection<ExecutableQuery> queries)
                       throws SQLException
        Same as executionQueries(ExecutableQuery...) but accepts a Collection instead.
        Parameters:
        queries - the queries to run
        Throws:
        SQLException - if something went wrong

      • executionQuery

        void executionQuery(String query,
                    Object... parameters)
             throws SQLException
        Executes a single query. This is a blocking operation.
        Parameters:
        query - the SQL statement before parameterisation
        parameters - the parameters to add to the statement
        Throws:
        SQLException - if something went wrong

      • selectionQueries

        ResultSet[] selectionQueries(ExecutableQuery... queries)
                      throws SQLException
        Executes a given set of queries and returns the results. This is a blocking operation.
        Parameters:
        queries - the ExecutableQuery objects to run
        Returns:
        result array ordered according to the order of the parameter array
        Throws:
        SQLException - if something went wrong

      • selectionQueries

        default ResultSet[] selectionQueries(List<ExecutableQuery> queries)
                              throws SQLException
        Same as selectionQueries(ExecutableQuery...) but accepts a List instead.
        Parameters:
        queries - the queries to run
        Returns:
        result array ordering according to the order of the parameter list
        Throws:
        SQLException - if something went wrong

      • selectionQuery

        ResultSet selectionQuery(String query,
                         Object... parameters)
                  throws SQLException
        Executes a single query and returns the result. This is a blocking operation.
        Parameters:
        query - the SQL statement before parameterisation
        parameters - the parameters to add to the statement
        Returns:
        the result set
        Throws:
        SQLException - if something went wrong
